programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, she’s often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: Marcus makes a Dew Drop-sized hot-air balloon for Phoebe and the Dews have a blast helping their kids from above, including secretly guiding Lola back to her family, before she accidentally follows Hip-Hop the frog out of the park. / Phoebe makes a pair of glasses for Bob the bird, but when seeing things clearly for the first time gets him lost, the Dews help Bob find his nest before his family arrives for a visit.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: The Dews think a double rainbow is making their powers change, but what they discover is that they are about to graduate to a new level of Dew Dropness, with the newfound ability to float in the air! / When Reed discovers he’s being assigned a family, he runs to tell Athena, only to find Athena and her house are missing! He now gets to join them on more adventures.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods

The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse

Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she’s not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Templeton’s hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Baby’s name.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.title: Whitney: Behind The Voice
programme.desc: A powerful journey into the meteoric rise of Whitney Houston — from her gospel roots to global superstardom — unraveling the tangled relationships, haunting battles with addiction, and the heartbreaking fall of a once-unshakable voice, before her untimely end.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: From the Rockies to the Pacific, British Columbia is a jewel of biodiversity! Roam vast landscapes where the mighty grizzly bear reigns supreme. It’s a majestic, wild world waiting to be preserved!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Life finds a way! Blown by winds and washed ashore, the Caribbean is now a mesmerizing hotspot of global biodiversity. Explore these fragile, emerald ecosystems and their incredible island resilience.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Step back in time! Explore Queensland’s ancient wetlands and primary rainforests. Home to survivors of prehistoric eras, it’s a vibrant journey to the very origins of tropical Australia.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the heart of Japan, Mena devours plant-based sushi and ramen. He learns to cook soba noodles from scratch, home-made mochi, and takes part in a traditional tea ceremony.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren commences his second Food Trail of South Africa in the world famous Kruger National Park and surrounds.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Johannesburg - the gateway city to exploring South Africa! In this episode Warren indulges in the vibrant international flavours and surrounds of the Sandton neighbourhood, loved by locals and visitors alike.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: The wild northeast coast of South Africa is like nothing you’ve seen. And it’s here Warren will find himself romanced by empty beaches, rugged open oceans, and waterways filled with wild hippopotamus.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: In this episode, Warren experiences the abundance of wildlife here, centering his experience around tracking and finding the elusive and endangered African Wild Dog.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren commences his second Food Trail of South Africa in the world famous Kruger National Park and surrounds.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Rediscover the Tet Offensive: two months of battles that killed more than 15,000 American and Allied troops, and triggered anti-war protests across the U.S. Explore reports, images, and combat footage, much of which hasn’t been seen since 1968.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam Liaw gathers what he has learned over the past few weeks to serve up an impressive five-course banquet dinner to some distinguished guests, including his mother.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S3
programme.desc: Ben’s food story journey starts in the deep south where he learns why lamb tastes so good. He meets the earliest pioneers producing truffles and travels by helicopter into Fiordland in search of Wapiti.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S3
programme.desc: Ben travels to Northland and learns about wine in the region. He discovers a peanut farm, meets tropical papaya fruit growers and catches up with a team of scientists cultivating kingfish like never before.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S3
programme.desc: It’s asparagus season – Ben picks the 3 varieties. He meets a farmer and understands the benefits of grass-fed beef. Ben catches up with the ‘Soil Sisters’ a movement focussed on growing your own fruit and vegetables.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S3
programme.desc: Ben checks out a sustainably farmed Green Shell Mussel Farm and visits a peanut butter factory. He travels to Canterbury to meet an ostrich farmer and cooks ostrich for the first time ever!

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S3
programme.desc: Ben meets a Gin maker, an Italian chacutier and celebrates a wine maker committed to the principles of sustainable farming. Ben milks sheep and learns how next generation farmers are diversifying their business.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S3
programme.desc: Ben experiences the art of cheese making. He meets a capsicum producer and learns about the provenance of the onion.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, she’s often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: Marcus makes a Dew Drop-sized hot-air balloon for Phoebe and the Dews have a blast helping their kids from above, including secretly guiding Lola back to her family, before she accidentally follows Hip-Hop the frog out of the park. / Phoebe makes a pair of glasses for Bob the bird, but when seeing things clearly for the first time gets him lost, the Dews help Bob find his nest before his family arrives for a visit.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: The Dews think a double rainbow is making their powers change, but what they discover is that they are about to graduate to a new level of Dew Dropness, with the newfound ability to float in the air! / When Reed discovers he’s being assigned a family, he runs to tell Athena, only to find Athena and her house are missing! While Eden and Phoebe search for Athena, Reed’s on Dew Drop duty for Athena. After successfully helping Athena's kids, Reed is assigned the family in the apartment below Athena. He now gets to join them on more adventures.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: The riders think they have discovered the King of Dragons but quickly learn along with the Flyers that the real King of the Dragons lives under Berserker Island

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: The riders battle the Flyers at Berserker Island while Hiccup and Dagur search the caves and find a Bewilderbeast egg

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canada’s most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she’s not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Templeton’s hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Baby’s name.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony races against Shashi and Layla through a Northern California ghost town, but Shashi and Layla are using the race as a cover for a heist on a billionaire’s train. Tony and his team are introduced to the other cool SH1FT3R racers, and while they can’t stop the heist without blowing their cover, they do manage to get a tracker on the train car Shashi and Layla stole.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Shashi sends Tony and Layla to steal weapons codes from a Russian oligarch, while Margaret “Echo” Pearl, Cisco and Frostee use Shashi’s absence to sneak into Shashi’s Cliffside mansion to investigate. Ms. Nowhere tells the team to look for the “keys” in Shashi’s mansion, but all they find are a couple of awesome super-cars.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Shashi stages a race up the privately-owned Mount Zebulon, and he invites Tony, Cisco, and Margaret “Echo” Pearl to participate. The crew soon discovers that Shashi is using the race to steal another super-car (this time from space!) – and he knows that Tony is working with the feds.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony races against Shashi and Layla through a Northern California ghost town, but Shashi and Layla are using the race as a cover for a heist on a billionaire’s train. Tony and his team are introduced to the other cool SH1FT3R racers, and while they can’t stop the heist without blowing their cover, they do manage to get a tracker on the train car Shashi and Layla stole.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Shashi sends Tony and Layla to steal weapons codes from a Russian oligarch, while Margaret “Echo” Pearl, Cisco and Frostee use Shashi’s absence to sneak into Shashi’s Cliffside mansion to investigate. Ms. Nowhere tells the team to look for the “keys” in Shashi’s mansion, but all they find are a couple of awesome super-cars.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Shashi stages a race up the privately-owned Mount Zebulon, and he invites Tony, Cisco, and Margaret “Echo” Pearl to participate. The crew soon discovers that Shashi is using the race to steal another super-car (this time from space!) – and he knows that Tony is working with the feds.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Village’s babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: With academy life on the horizon, the PALs work together to tame wild yearling Governor before they leave. But maybe he's not meant to be broken.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: The Paladins struggle to escape after Sendak captures them, their lions, and Admiral Sanda

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Sandra insists on breaking the gender barrier of a “boys only” skateboard race. But the race is one with a history for being incredibly dangerous. Will Sandra let Liam “save” her or will she save her reputation as the coolest sk8terchick at Cosmos High?

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: A little white lie told to his ping-pong loving grandmother forces Raffi to actually try out for the team when they make the finals. Grandma is keen to see her favourite grandson play her favourite sport and he's not about to let her down. It soon becomes apparent that normally athletic Raffi is all thumbs when it comes to what team captain Antoine pretentiously refers to as table tennis.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Spring has sprung and love is in the air at Cosmos High. When the other pods pressure Sandra and Raffi to couple-up, lovelorn Birch and Liam decide to take matters into their own hands ensuring that the reluctant pair don't end up together.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: A cute guy into comics mistakes Birch's artwork as Sandra's comic. When the ruse is revealed, he falls for Birch. Sandra's ire rises, but both girls ultimately find out they've got a High School Lothario on their hands and reveal him to the sisterhood of Cosmos High.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: All the tots are picking fruit so Poppy can use it to make her famous ice cream. Stingo thinks he has come up with a much better plan to get hold of some ice cream without having to pick anything… will it work?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi wants to repaint her kitchen but Poppy has run out of paint. Can anybody else come up with an idea to brighten up her walls?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Slugsy is having trouble courting Primrose. Stingo's cousin Hornetto offers to help him. But could he be up to no good?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun… except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Diggly has had enough of the heap of unwanted items next to his compost heap. Stingo decides to "resell" them to the other tots and unwittingly helps everybody out!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Bumble has been asked to Aunt Tulip's for tea but he is worried that his manners are not up to scratch. He asks the other tots to help him out.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia sees herself as a great concert pianist, though her piano teacher thinks she needs a little more practice. But when her little brother Ian begins taking his own piano lessons – and turns out to be pretty good – Olivia isn't sure if there's room for two prodigies in the family.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Francine is chosen to play goalie, and Olivia is disappointed that she doesn't get to wear the red goalie jersey. Even worse, the uniform she designs for herself only causes chaos and confusion among her teammates. But when Francine is better at dodging the ball than stopping it, it's up to Olivia to put on the red goalie jersey and save the day

programme.title: Nostalgia
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Across the Strait
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: Unkind Ladies
programme.desc: This drama features the women of three generations and people around them. Mari grows up as a good teacher of this generation where there is no true mentor. Hyeonsuk, who has been a troublemaker, realizes the love and support of her family. Kang Sunok regards herself as unlucky, but later on realizes how happy she has been. How can you hold up when your life gets tough? You will figure it out by holding up day by day, just like these women in the drama.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true 'home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Recipe for Love
programme.desc: In Onjeong Market, located in Onjeong, a town some distance away from Seoul, the area is buzzing with change as apartment complexes are built and plans for subway extensions and new town developments are announced. Across a single street stand a principled general hospital, Gongmyeongjeongdae Clinic, and traditional Korean clinic, Yangji Barun Clinic. The two families who run these places have been bitter enemies for years, bound by a long standing grudge from an incident in the past. Even the smallest matters turn into big fights, making them the most famous rival families in Onjeong. This is a family growth drama about these two families as they unravel their long held misunderstandings, heal their wounds, learn to love one another, and are reborn as one family.

programme.title: The Best of Immortal Songs
programme.desc: The true classic of the century is born again! The legendary classic is reinterpreted by the best vocalists in Korea. Don't miss out on the heart-moving moments that transcend generations.

programme.title: Love Track
programme.desc: Ten Different Shapes of Love Stories

programme.title: My Run, My Way
programme.desc: My Run, My Way — Your Run-trip Guide The moment you run, the journey begins! Travel is a way to rediscover yourself in unfamiliar places. The moment you start to run, it's no longer just sightseeing — it becomes an experience. <My Run, My Way> is a run-trip project that combines running, local travel, and recovery all in one.

programme.desc: A collection of outrageous problems that you have never heard of! A great 'knowledge talk show' where problematic children who are struggling and fighting in the emotional rooftop room gain true wisdom about life and the world.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Oh My Venus

programme.title: The Best of Immortal Songs

programme.title: Walking On Thin Ice
programme.desc: Eunsoo was an ordinary wife and mother who never broke a rule. But when her husband is given a death sentence by illness, her daughter walks away from school, and the family home is about to be taken, life leaves her cornered. Then, a bag stuffed with drugs falls into her hands like a fate. To save her family, she makes a choice she can't turn back from.

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to investigate. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Cao’s enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Bei’s concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy is visiting two restaurants that craft their legendary menus around one-star ingredients. First up, he heads to Sweet Potato Sensations in Detroit, Michigan.

programme.desc: After months of investigation, Abby becomes convinced that she's found her daughter's abductor. With the authorities dismissing her as a grief-stricken mother, she takes matters into her own hands.

programme.desc: When Allie's father George takes her on a trip to Greece to discover her familial roots, George soon ends up murdered. Now Allie must uncover long-kept family secrets to bring the killer to justice.

programme.desc: The remaining chefs are back with their first Mystery Box Challenge, apples! With both sweet and savoury flavours, the chef with immunity is tasked with assigning varieties of dish to each region.

programme.title: Theresa Caputo: Raising Spirits (S1)
programme.desc: The Caputos are briefly all under the same roof for the first time in weeks. Theresa visits her cousins in Rehoboth Beach for an impromptu vacation in between tour stops.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Aussie legend Curtis Stone returns for a slow cooked lamb and ravioli cook-along, which descends into chaos as a home-made ricotta derails some contestants multiple times.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Rachael prepares a well-rounded meal of a French-cut rack of lamb, baked with Dijon mustard and seasoned breadcrumbs, and a side dish of brown and wild rice with porcini mushrooms and sautéed spinach.

programme.title: Kailangan Ko'y Ikaw
programme.desc: Francine Natra (Regine Velasquez) and Gimo Talumpati (Robin Padilla) crossed paths when Gimo won the "Date With A Star" contest thus taking the popular Francine on a special date. But their fairytale love story struggled when the relationship went public.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: A Filipino adaptation of a South Korean film about Yuri (Bela Padilla), a woman haunted by ghosts after a car accident. Victor (Marco Gumabao), a street magician, turns her experiences into a popular horror-magic performance.

programme.title: Yung Libro Sa Napanood Ko
programme.desc: Lisa, a book author and Kim Gun Hoo, a Korean fan, meet and tour South Korea's towns together. As they spend more time with each other, Lisa eventually learns a past that apparently Gun Hoo was a big part of. Feeling confused and betrayed, Lisa disappears from his life again.

programme.title: Strebel, Gestapo ng Maynila
programme.desc: The era when Western Police District was truly, Manila’s Finest. Major Robert Strebel is a policeman whose strongest trait is his strong sense of duty. A law enforcer who is willing to take the extra length to get his responsibilities done.

programme.title: Talk Back and You're Dead
programme.desc: This is a story of Samantha Perez (Nadine Lustre), a girl who unbelievably fell in love with a delinquent, hot-headed guy named Timothy Odelle Pendleton aka Top (James Reid), the leader of the gang, Lucky 13.

programme.title: Love The Way U Lie
programme.desc: With the help of a spunky, lonely-in-love psychic, a deceased wife tries to get her grieving husband to move on. In the process, sparks begin to fly.

programme.title: When Love Begins
programme.desc: When Michelle accidentally steps on a sea urchin, she meets Ben, who suggests that someone should pee on her foot to relieve her of the pain.The two instantly hit it off despite their apparent differences.

programme.title: Maid in London
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, a young mother, Margo (Andi Eigenmann) and her best friend, Faye (Alexis Navarro) are forced to cling to the edge of a knife so they could travel in the United Kingdom.

programme.title: Alindog Ni Barbara
programme.desc: Though born twins, Barbara and Elena are worlds apart, Elena is bright and vigorous, while Barbara is mentally retarded. Upon seeing her dear friend's killing, Barbara discovers an unusual and menacing power she possesses: the power to annihiliate with her eyes.

programme.title: Full Moon
programme.desc: A young girl (Barbie Forteza) has her first brush with romance. Unluckily for her, her paramour (Derrick Monasterio) bears a dark, monstrous secret that will soon prove to be a challenge for their young love.

programme.title: Exit Point
programme.desc: Because of prison overcrowding, 12 inmates were sent to an island where they must fight and survive for freedom.

programme.title: Para Kang Papa Mo
programme.desc: In the vibrant 1990s Philippines, the infectious trend of village-level dance contests echoes through communities. Young talents Anton, Ric, and Jose are at the heart of it. Yet, envy lurks in the shadows, a malicious force conspiring to dismantle their dreams.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S2 E01 - The Widow
programme.desc: New IMF leader Jim Phelps has his team for the next covert mission: Cinnamon Carter is the female seductress, Rollin Hand is the master of disguise, Willie Armitage is the muscle, and Barney Collier is the electronics whiz.

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S1 E21 - Greater Good
programme.desc: Xena, one of the fiercest, sexiest, most self-empowered women as she travels defending the innocent from the forces of darkness. She is the very definition of girl power.

programme.title: The Waltons S3 E08 - The System
programme.desc: Eldest son, John-Boy Walton, makes the family proud as he starts his first year in college, pursuing his dream of becoming a writer--a course that is both challenging and rewarding for John-Boy and the entire Walton family.Younger siblings Jason and Mary Ellen Walton discover the professions to which they will devote their lives in this heartwarming drama about growing up in the loving embrace of a large Appalachia family.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S5 E23 - Louise's Convention
programme.desc: With his dry-cleaning business booming, George Jefferson moves his family--level-headed wife Louise and son Lionel to the upper east side. But life in a luxurious Manhattan high-rise holds unexpected pitfalls for George.

programme.title: Frasier S3 E24 - You Can Go Home Again
programme.desc: In the third season of FRASIER additions to the recurring cast include Marta, Maris' maid and go-between, Frasier's son, Frederick, and Kate Costas, the headstrong, ratings-obsessed new manager of Frasier's home radio station KACL.

programme.title: Sinasamba Kita (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lorna, the illegitimate daughter of a business tycoon was left in the care of her half-sister, Vilma, upon the death of their father. Though she took care of all her material needs, she refused to show the girl any kind of affection.

programme.title: Jesus Calderon (Maton)
programme.desc: This is another take-off on the eternal poor boy loves rich girl tale. Love wins out in the end but only after Jesus Calderon has proven himself, and the lovely damsel in distress has learned to love and trust him with all her heart.

programme.title: Duplikado
programme.desc: One look. Two people. One name. Two destinies. Fate separated them on the very day they were born.

programme.title: Swindler's List
programme.desc: Leo and Niño were the swindlers in this wacky tale. But only because of a very good reason: to provide a home for the orphanage. The duo decided to raise money by swindling the rich to give to the poor.

programme.title: Alfredo Lim: Batas Ng Maynila
programme.desc: This film is based on the life story of policeman Alfredo Lim who rose from street cop to director of the National Bureau of Investigation and eventually Mayor of the City of Manila.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: When Andy marries Grace, he is surprised to discover that her family are staying with them. Andy becomes the "house-band" and serves his wife and her family.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.

programme.title: Pangako Ng Kahapon
programme.desc: Set in the picturesque abaca plantations of Bicol with the perfect Mayon Volcano in the background, this is a film about a greedy family, corrupt politicians and the hapless tenants whose lives crossed their path.

programme.title: Pilya
programme.desc: Ditas has the body of a full-grown adult but her sense is that of a child. Although she exists in an environment where vulgarity is deemed normal, she maintains her wide-eyed innocence.

programme.title: Reputasyon
programme.desc: What a nice schoolgirl like Miya Brown (Mia Nolasco) doing in a club as G.R.O.? She has learned that there is life beyond her mother's world and that of her father's.

programme.title: Isla
programme.desc: Beauty Queen, Maria Isabel Lopez portrayed the role of Isla, the island maiden who has all the males, including her father, lusting after her. Her dream was to leave her primitive surroundings and find another life in the big city.

programme.title: Laruan
programme.desc: Joy (Carmi Martin) has only one ambition in life--to get rich and give her family a more comfortable life. She enslaves herself to William (Mark Gil) in her hope that he will help her achieve her goal.

programme.title: Sana Dalawa Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: A young man who was engaged to be married found himself attracted to another woman. Lacking the nerve to call off the wedding, he went through with the ceremony hopeful that his bride would give him the strength to avoid his other love.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Australia
programme.desc: From New York and Sydney, the latest news impacting markets, business and finance around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open

programme.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
programme.desc: Roblox CEO & Co-Founder David Baszucki. Bloomberg talks to David Baszucki about the success of the online gaming platform, Roblox.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Open

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
programme.desc: From New York, the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close

programme.title: Smallville S1 14
programme.desc: Lex faces the consequences of a scandal from his past in Metropolis when an old enemy comes to Smallville intent on destroying Lex's life, putting Clark and Lana in danger.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 9
programme.desc: Michael works at a camping store where his life-saving s'mores and pop-up coolers stun would-be glampers, and later at a health food store, a child safety pill bottle with built-in invisibility proves too complicated for adults. Then, at variety store, a customer goes off the rails when Michael adjusts the size of a model train.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 4
programme.desc: The staff has 72 hours to rescue a gun-control bill.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 1
programme.desc: Lori knows from her research that two of these bins previously belonged to the same owner. She and Brandon win one of them, an aviation bin; now they have to find the other one. But things don't go the way they want when Dan, the Biker Dude, ends upwith the matching bin; now they either have to make a deal, or get stuck with half a plane.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 08
programme.desc: Our hosts find hacks for retrieving lost objects, separating egg yolks, and removing wallpaper stains. They'll also make duct tape an All-Star, find another use for walnuts, and show you how to hack your home while you're away.

programme.title: Container Wars S2 10
programme.desc: The biggest auction on the planet sails to the middle of the Pacific Ocean when a mysterious container is dredged up from the bottom of the sea. Royal rumors spark golden expectations, but how could have any of the waterlogged loot survived?

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 14
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Joe and Q say aloha in a fun Hawaiian episode! The future looks hazy when the guys pose as fortune tellers and practice indecent proposals at a romantic waterfall. Plus, it's blood in the water for the big loser.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 3
programme.desc: The big tension of the day is between T Money and Brandon. T goes for the mystery bins -- the box and the barrels. The antique gun he finds has been altered, so he needs to find out if it's worth anything.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 4
programme.desc: Papa Bear is back, and he's bigger than ever. He goes for a pair of mysterious blue shipping cases. Brandon and Lori find a 3 D printer, but have no idea what it does or how much it's worth until they take it to get appraised. What they find out amazes them.

programme.title: Smallville S1 15
programme.desc: Clark must solve the riddle of the mysterious Nicodemus flower and Lex's suspicious involvement with it.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 11
programme.desc: Tonight, Michael tries to pull a fast one on burger joint patrons with his inflatable hot dogs and his unusual technique for bagging buns. Then he creeps out a flea market vendor when he brings an acrylic encased arachnid back to life, and later his co-worker doesn't give a hoot about her job at the camping store when an owl takes over their display.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 12
programme.desc: Michael hits the jackpot at a convenience store and amazes a mother when he demonstrates her child's genius abilities at a toy store. Later, MIchael astonishes his Japanese restaurant co-worker with a set-up that really takes the cake.

programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Tulsa detectives believe the victim of a shooting was a Good Samaritan who'd been robbed. But at trial, the jury must decide if his killer actually acted in fear of his own life.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S5)
programme.desc: A painful breakup ends in tragedy when a correctional officer fatally wounds his ex-girlfriend. The prosecution say he's a killer, but the defence argues he was under attack and shot in self-defence.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When a mystery woman's burning body is found in an oil field in 2006, the rural community of Kilgore and a determined Texas lawman show why you don't mess with the Lone Star State.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Detectives gather crucial information about a double-homicide from neighbourhood surveillance footage, but they're not able to identify and track the killer until some key digital data is uncovered.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: The family of a missing Texas mother becomes concerned when they start receiving suspicious text messages from her phone.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When gambler Scott Martinez, 47, is found eviscerated by a sword in his La Mesa, CA, home, investigators can't tell who is telling the truth within his inner circle.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A man was arrested for stealing high-end perfumes from a major retailer, and an aspiring mortician struggles to make bail so she can get out for her daughter's homecoming dance.

programme.title: Hoarders (S15)
programme.desc: Between John's dumpster diving, weekly swap meet purchases, and occasional yard sale finds, John has collected a massive amount of clutter over the years.

programme.title: Hoarders (S15)
programme.desc: Local code enforcement has warned John repeatedly about property violations. With the Hoarders team’s help, he must finally clean up or face enforcement action that could cost him everything.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: When a young woman vanishes, detectives zero in on her controlling estranged husband—whose story continually changes in the interrogation room.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: A jilted lover takes to the internet to stalk her ex and threaten his girlfriend. When she finally follows through on her violent threats, detectives find themselves entangled in a deadly web of deception.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: A day's walk along the banks of the Ceresio, with a visit to the historic centre of Carona, the church of Santa Maria d'Ongero and the San Grato park.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Aged 23, Valeriia Novikova left Russia to escape a restrictive society. She arrived in France thanks to an 'Au Pair' programme, decided to study languages and then did her 'coming out'. The young woman has created strong links with her host family and her community.

programme.title: Ils Vecurent Heureux
programme.desc: Out of boredom, Eve let herself be tempted by an apple, without realizing what it would cause. Since then, Adam resents her because it turned his life upside down.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: A day's walk along the banks of the Ceresio, with a visit to the historic centre of Carona, the church of Santa Maria d'Ongero and the San Grato park.

programme.title: Bestioles & Cie
programme.desc: Whether it's a lake, tree or field, there are always a host of mini-creatures. Often feared, because unknown, we discover just how fascinating they are as we take an immersive visit into their world. Often, and wrongly, underestimated, they play an essential role in the natural cycle of life.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Enquetes De Region
programme.desc: Travels to discover the regions of France. Through these territories, the investigations come as close as possible to the issues of today's society.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Chien De La Casse
programme.desc: Childhood friends Dog, the quiet one, and Mirales, the flamboyant one, ward off boredom by roaming the streets in their little village in the south of France. One day, Elsa moves into the village. Dog falls in love and Mirales can't stand it.

programme.title: Sami La Fugue
programme.desc: A winter in Franche-Comte. Sami, committed to a psychiatric hospital, receives a visit from his mother and younger sister, who tell him that their mare has died. The news sends everything reeling...

programme.title: Les Bienvenu... Ou Presque !
programme.desc: Loïc has got it into his head that it would be a good idea to introduce Rosalie's sister to Nick, but the latter is dead against it. Pascale and Lea, however, think it's a great suggestion.

programme.title: Les Bienvenu... Ou Presque !
programme.desc: Nick has to decide what he wants to do when he's older and contacts Andy to find out more about being an artist. He discovers him in a terrible state after his break-up with Pascale.

programme.title: Les Bienvenu... Ou Presque !
programme.desc: Fred can't take part in the school talent show because she'd left it too late and the inscriptions have closed. Pascale is outraged and contacts the headmaster.

programme.title: Les Bienvenu... Ou Presque !
programme.desc: Loïc learns that Rosalie's father wants to meet him but he's too stressed-out to agree. When he goes to the pizzeria to ask Nick for his advice who should he cross but his step-father...

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: On the outskirts of Fontainebleau, the Musee des Peintres de Barbizon traces the history of Impressionism. A self-taught chef turned Michelin-starred chef, Guy Martin looks back on his gastronomic career at the Grand Vefour. Time travel with Chemena Kamali, at the helm of Chloe. The art of straw marquetry with Stephanie Trolez.

programme.title: Les Amants De Brasmort
programme.desc: Brasmort is a barge cemetery. This is where Jean, a down-and-out sailor, and Monique, the daughter of a very rich shipowner, declare their love for each other. But they will need courage to face up to all that separates them.

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: Fraiche
programme.desc: At the age of 58 and at the head of a literary programme on the radio, Anne leads a settled and peaceful family life. Until the day she attacks a young woman with incredible violence simply because she offers Anne her seat on the metro.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 24
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 9
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 35
programme.desc: This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he vowed to seek revenge against the influential retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Ha-pi House is a home away from home for a group of single half-Pinoys and Pinoys born and raised overseas who have come home to rediscover their Filipino roots.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 3
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Operation Break the Casanova's Heart ep 1
programme.desc: After Stephen, the school's casanova, breaks the heart of Naomi's bestfriend, Kryzel, Naomi becomes determined to seek revenge. In her effort to do so, she is discovered by the HSCC (Haters of Stephen Cruz Coalition), a secret group composed of Stephen's ex-girlfriends who seek revenge on Stephen and recruits her on their mission guided by 10 steps to break the casanova's heart.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
